Biogeography of fungal endophytes in *Metrosideros excelsa* across San Francisco.

Emma was an undergraduate honors student in the lab. Her thesis is currently being reviewed for publication, and is available as [a fully-reproducible manuscript on GitHub](https://github.com/ZimmermanLab/SF-metrosideros-endophytes).
